fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
You can't (pick 1 per night):
- Die for the night. 3 uses.
- Be lynched the next day. 2 uses.
- Be visited (all players visiting you will be roleblocked) for the night. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You can't:
- Be changed (conversion immunity).
- Be blocked (roleblock immunity).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game.
